marklogic.body: I'm afraid we have , Joe ! The folks have been far too complacent for far too long ! My opinion is that this upcoming election is a do-or-die moment in America's history . Obama is a Statist ; he believes that big government is imperative in order to pursue his " social justice " agenda . Here is a quote from Francis Schaeffer's book , How Should We Then Live : " once the Judeo-Christian base is gone , man will not raise his voice in protest unless his peace or personal affluence is threatened " . My personal opinion is that " social justice " is a form of religion ; a substitute for Christianity ! The flawed thinking in this approach to addressing social ill , like poverty , is that the requisite corrective actions are coerced , not voluntary ! Charity that is coerced is no longer charity . Government has replaced the Church as the ' haven of safety ' for the needy or appressed ; personal charity has bern replaced by corporate charity ( no more personal Bleeding here !) . Government becomes the arbiter of moral standards ( the majority opinion vs natural law ) under the Statist form of government ; not God ! We have not yet quite Reached the point where a sufficient number of citizens have been economically devastated , but that time is not far distant - look at Greece ! Only then will the order be given to implement the emergency measures just signed into law by EO . But now , all that Obama needs to implement these " emergency " laws , is a " national crisis "! Who makes that decision ? The man himself !
